I originally ordered a Medium and had to return it because BOYYYY was it short! Large fit perfect! 5’2, I’m wearing 5in platform heels 140lbs I joke and say from the back I’m built like SpongeBob because I don’t have a narrow waist due to too many oblique workouts. From the side is a different conversation Bubble butt and thick thighs. I don’t have a large chest, these are 4yrs of breastfeeding 2 babies all natural long yiittties. I’m a 34DD, 36D but mostly 🙃skin Material was stretchy and NOT sheer! I am not wearing spanks but wore a (brown) nude colored seamless thong. The second picture I’m “running” and you can see the hemline of the dress just barely covers my cheeks The little peekaboo under the boob line is so freaking cute! I did not wear a bra the material in the bust is double lined stretchy material and held me in all the right places! I loved this so freaking much! “Dirty 30” and “13 going on 30” were the themes for my 30th birthday 5 day get away with just my girlfriends!
